highlights: Development and support for a multi-component Java-based application built using Spring Boot, deployed to AWS, and secured with industry-standard scanning tools (SAST, SCA, DAST).
Migrated application components from on-prem to AWS, utilizing Jenkins pipelines, Urban Code Deploy, and Nexus for continuous integration and deployment.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Spring Boot, integrated with Angular UI, and deployed as Docker containers to ECS.
Manage AWS Infrastructure including, but not limited to Security Groups, Parameter Store, Secrets Manager, and Route53 ensuring secure, scalable deployment and access control.
Manage a batch processing system using AWS EventBridge, Step Functions, and Lambda to automate data processing tasks between Oracle and Postgres databases.
Integrated Lambda Layers to handle certification access and dependency management.
Oversaw application monitoring and alerting with CloudWatch, setting up alarms and logs for all components, and integrated with automated testing tools like Selenium, SauceLabs, and JMeter.
Led efforts in security analyzation and prevention along 3rd party dependency and vulnerability remediation.
Collaborated to integrate Automated, One-Touch Failover Implementations for all AWS components using Route53, Lambda, and Enterprise Integrations.

Heavily involved in collaboration on Confluence and team Agile processes, working with JIRA for sprint planning, ticket creation, and team coordination while providing leadership in onboarding and training new hires.
Onboarding and integrating User to Service and Service to Service relationships behind Apigee using OAuth2, JWT, and company wide adherence to Enterprise SSL/TLS Standards
Instructed students on Java full-stack development, covering core Java OOP principles, Spring Framework, and integrating front-end UI with backend services for a seamless application architecture.
Led hands-on workshops on front-end development using Angular, guiding through module creation, event binding, and routing.
Taught best practices in version control using Git and Bitbucket for managing repositories and collaborating effectively.
Developed and maintained full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Angular, and React, integrating with MySQL databases and connecting dynamic front-end components to REST APIs.
Contributed to remote full-stack Java-based games utilizing Git, GitHub, and GitKraken for version control and team collaboration.
